channel.title: Stat bonuses like frugooscape
channel.description: ok well idk if any one knows how to do this but ill ask anyways i would like to know how frugooscape got 126 to be all the stat bonuses even with armors on?

item.title: Stat bonuses like frugooscape
item.dc:creator: @Epic_Ancient Epic Ancient
item.description:
@Epic_Ancient wrote:

jmood128:

ya i what to change it so the bonuses can still load from items but also have them load so they can be set for things like i am going to try to make it so you can be reborn like on Conquer when you get to level 130 you know and you get more hits or what ever i what to do the same thing on here

Still don’t get it.
Can you explain it in proper english… I’m not good with “text” format. ^^"
Punctuation = Mandatory; Capitalization, on the other hand, is not.

Otherwise I can’t help you, but I’m sure SOMEONE knows what you’re talking about.

Read full topic

item.title: Stat bonuses like frugooscape
item.dc:creator: @Epic_Ancient Epic Ancient
item.description:
@Epic_Ancient wrote:

By changing all the stat bonuses for each item… As annoying as it would be.

That, or fix it. Not sure what you mean here.

Fix it = A set bonus that cannot be changed.
